lead_paragraph: McMURRY--Ralph Lewis, Esq.,71, of Maplewood, NJ passed away on Sunday, March 27, 2016. He is survived by his two sisters, Laura and Martha McMurry, his two daughters, Eleana (Laura Boutwell) and Anastasia McMurry, and his grandson, Luca Henry Boutwell-McMurry. A memorial gathering is scheduled for Saturday, April 2, 2016 from 1:00-4:00pm (storytelling and tributes at 2:30pm), at the Reed-Reeves Arboretum in Summit, NJ. This will be an informal event and is meant to be a celebration of Ralph's life. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MCMURRY, RALPH LEWIS, ESQ.
